description: The AI writing tools everyone is talking about. For free.
title: Free AI Writing And SEO Tools | FraseExpandToggle MenuFacebook GroupTwitterLinkedinScroll to topExpand
introduction: Frase is an AI-powered tool that helps analyze search queries and generate research-driven SEO content. It offers various pricing plans for different user needs, including a free trial option. Additionally, users can enhance the core functionality with add-ons like the Pro Add-on and API Add-on.
pricing: Frase offers a free trial with no commitment. The pricing plans include Solo for $15/month, Basic for $45/month, and Team for $115/month. There are discounts for annual payments. Users can also unlock additional features with add-ons like the Pro Add-on and API Add-on.

faqs.question: Is there a free trial available?
faqs.answer: Yes, Frase offers a free trial with no commitment and no credit card required.

faqs.question: What are the pricing plans for Frase?
faqs.answer: Frase offers Solo for $15/month, Basic for $45/month, and Team for $115/month. There are discounts for annual payments.

faqs.question: What are the available add-ons for Frase?
faqs.answer: Frase offers Pro Add-on for $35/month and API Add-on starting at $50/month to enhance the core functionality.
